Power of Knoydart

After almost 5 years of working, studying and living in Scotland, I never heard of Knoydart before. In beginning of 2014 I started to work on an exciting project called Off the Grid looking at health and energy infrastructure in three locations: India, Papua New Guinea and Scotland. In September that Jamie Co-investigator of Off the Grid asked me to join another project that he was leading in collaboration with Knoydart Foundation, Local Energy Scotland and Community Energy Scotland. The project were looking at ....

As someone who lived in a city for all their life, the difficulties of being off the national grid never occured to me until I started to work on Off the Grid project and learning more about Eigg and Knoydart.

More soon...
